column4: I have setup a virtualbox VM running windows 7 on my ubuntu machine. I have to use a WINDOWS ONLY (f5) VPN for work. I would like to tunnel traffic through my ubuntu (host) box through the windows 7 (VM) machine. Can anyone point me in the right direction to achieve this?
Just to be clear I don't think you can do that.  Aside from that though, how does the VPN know your operating system?
-- It uses a browser plugin that only works on windows machines
